description:
Keep your repair kit handy. This seat post bag has easy zippered access in a water-resistant design. It's perfectly sized for a spare tube and a multi-tool.

  • 140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant
  • Velcro® attachment loops let you secure the bag under your saddle rails and seat post
  • YKK® Vislon zipper with polyurethane coating seals out the weather
  • Internal mesh pockets keep you organized
  • Bike light loop
name: EVOC Tour Seat Bag
